schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions

items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.
items.title: Alternate accession

external_ids.description: External identifiers that uniquely identify the donor of the sample, e.g. for strains it might be a strain identifier at a repository or a de-identified donor ID for a person.
external_ids.comment: List of identifiers that are used by external resources that can be used to identify samples from that particular donor or strain.
external_ids.title: Unique external identifier(s) of strain or donor

items.description: External identifier that uniquely identify the donor of the sample, e.g. for strains it might be a strain identifier at a repository or a de-identified donor ID for a person.

external_ids.title: Unique external identifier(s) of strain or donor

description: Schema for submitting a worm strain.
title: Worm donor

parent_strains.comment: Parent strains list can contain up to two entries, of strains of the same organism.

comment: The worm donor object is meant to represent a strain not an individual worm.

___genotype.description: The genotype of the strain according to accepted nomenclature conventions: http://www.wormbase.org/about/userguide/nomenclature#k89607hgcf24ea13jbid5--10.

___outcrossed_strain.comment: For worm strains, see worm_donor.json for available identifiers.
___outcrossed_strain.title: Outcrossed strain background

___parent_strains.description: Donor IDs of parent strains, if known.
___parent_strains.comment: List of strains crossed to produce this worm strain.
___parent_strains.title: Parent strains

items.description: A donor ID of a parent strain, if known.
items.title: Parent strain

___organism.comment: Do not submit. DCC personnel is responsible for submission of this property.

___num_times_outcrossed.description: The number of out/backcrossed when constructing the strain
___num_times_outcrossed.title: Number of times outcrossed

___dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
___dbxrefs.comment: Do not submit. DCC personnel is responsible for submission of donor external resource identifiers.
___dbxrefs.title: External resources

items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
items.title: External identifier
